text.section: After an answer has been filed in a proceeding for review under § 3-202 of this subtitle, the matter shall stand ready for trial on 15 days' notice by any party.

section.section: This subsection does not apply to proceedings before the Court of Special Appeals or the Court of Appeals.
A court shall give preference to a proceeding under this subtitle over all other civil actions except actions concerning elections, regardless of the position of the other actions on the docket.
A court shall always be open for the trial of a proceeding under this subtitle.
